changeSet.author: chalme
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ${table.prefix}datasheet_record_archive ( id bigint unsigned not null comment 'Primary key', dst_id varchar(50) not null comment 'Datasheet ID(link#xxxx_datasheet#dst_id)', record_id varchar(50) not null comment 'Data record ID(link#xxxx_datasheet_record#record_id)', is_archived tinyint unsigned default 0 null comment 'Archive tag(0:no,1:yes)', is_deleted tinyint unsigned default 0 null comment 'Delete tag(0:no,1:yes)', archived_by bigint null comment 'Archive User', archived_at timestamp default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP null comment 'Archive Time', created_by bigint null comment 'Create User', updated_by bigint null comment 'Update User', created_at timestamp default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP not null comment 'Created Time', updated_at timestamp default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP null on update CURRENT_TIMESTAMP comment 'Updated Time', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE, UNIQUE KEY `uk_dst_id_record_id` (`dst_id`, `record_id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='Workbench - Datasheet Record Archive';
